dict.string: Network not available. Please check your Wi-Fi networks.
Sorry, can't find any device, please make sure your device is turned on.
Failed to connect to device, attempting to reconnect ...
This preset is already exist, do you want to overwrite it?
You already have the latest version.
There is a newer version available. Would you like to update now ?
AirMusic Control App is easy-to-use internet radio controller.

AirMusic Control App is designed to control internet radio device using Magic platform. It provides you easy and comfortable operation with Android device.
*In order to improve its usability, please update your radio to the latest version. *For Wi-Fi only.
It provides you easy and comfortable operation with Android device.
*In order to improve its usability, please update your radio to the latest version.
1. It may take up to 30 seconds to connect to network
2. if success, the blue led is solid on, then you can start enjoying wifi music
3. if failure, the red led is blinking, please re-configure again
